channel.title: Ugly fire cape fix
channel.description:
alright so currently i have this... [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/836/o9j.png/][IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/7614/o9j.png[/img][/URL]
so yeah, without doubt, weve all seen this before and we know it looks SHIT, lets fucking do something about it.
this is what i would like it to be: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/22/kfjc.png/][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/5251/kfjc.png[/img][/URL]
all i need to know is how to change the inventory model, do i use a cache editor? and if so, how do i use it to change the image.
build: 317/474

item.title: Ugly fire cape fix
item.dc:creator: @RubixD RubixD
item.description:
@RubixD wrote:

Fire capez:

hey fudge you!!! jokes - you’re probably loading an older version of the model, try using a cache editor if it doesn’t work it might be manually hard coded lol.

ahhh but i dont know how to handle the cache editor q.q could you explain it to me?

Read full topic
